fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -During the first day, create a new faction for that game. It must be an REF.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You need at least 4 roles for this faction, one of which must be a head role
-You will need to include at least 4 features in this faction. The host reserves the right to deny any of these features if they deem them to be unbalanced.
-You cannot have features that work identically to other factions
-Once created, unless specified, up to 3 random town/good faction members will be converted to your new faction.
-You then reroll into the head role of your created faction.
-If you die, your faction members are reverted back to their original faction and rerolled into a role of the same subalignment.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Create a new faction and win as that faction.
